page.title: 14CURDWORTH AREA PUBLICATIONS
page.content: THERE ARE TWO PUBLICATIONS IN CURDWORTH THE COUNCIL CRIER AND THE PARISH NEWS. THE COUNCIL CRIER IS A FREE NEWS SHEET WHICH IS DELIVERED TO OVER 400 HOMES EVERY MONTH. IT HIGHLIGHTS CURRENT ISSUES WHICH ARE IMPORTANT TO CURDWORTH. SOCIAL EVENTS, ADVERTISEMENTS, PERSONAL AND COMMERCIAL, ARE ALSO INCLUDED. THE PARISH NEWS IS A MONTHLY MAGAZINE. IT IS A CHURCH PUBLICATION, PRICE 5P DISTRIBUTED BY VOLUNTEERS. IT IS CONCERNED WITH THE ACTIVITIES OF THE CHURCH AND ITS RELATED GROUPS. IT ALSO CONTAINS ADVERTISEMENTS. WATER ORTON HAS THREE MONTHLY PUBLICATIONS; A CHURCH MAGAZINE, A NEWS SHEET AND THE COLESHILL AND WATER ORTON GAZETTE WHICH COVERS PAST AND FUTURE LOCAL EVENTS AND DISPLAYS ADVERTISEMENTS. THE NEWS SHEET HIGHLIGHTS LOCAL EVENTS AND ALSO DISPLAYS ADVERTISEMENTS.
